name: Heikki Kovalainen
introduction: Heikki Johannes Kovalainen (born October 19, 1981 in Suomussalmi, Kainuu, Finland) is a Finnish Formula One motor racing driver who previously drove for Caterham-Renault and Lotus-Renault in 2013, having previously raced for Renault, McLaren and the Malaysian Lotus team (now Caterham). Kovalainen has driven in F1 from 2007 to 2013 and has achieved his one and only win at the 2008 Hungarian Grand Prix, while driving for McLaren-Mercedes. He is also the 100th driver to win a Formula One Grand Prix when he won it.
